title: Akshay Kumar shoots Holi song for Toilet Ek Prem Katha. See pics and videos | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Akshay Kumar shoots Holi song for Toilet Ek Prem Katha. See pics and videos 
Starring Akshay Kumar and Bhumi Pednekar and directed by Shree Narayan Singh, Toilet Ek Prem Katha will highlight the importance of the pay-and-use toilet scheme and try its bit to curb the problem of open defecation. bollywood Updated: Feb 18, 2017 19:46 IST Hindustan Times Akshay Kumar snapped on the sets of Toilet Ek Prem Katha. 
Akshay Kumar, whose recent release Jolly LLB 2 is scoring big at the box office, is back to work and has started shooting for his next. He was spotted shooting for Toilet Ek Prem Katha in Hoshangabad, Bhopal, recently and the pictures are going viral online. Bhumi Pednekar stars opposite Akshay in the film. 
Helmed by Shree Narayan Singh, the film will highlight the importance of the pay-and-use toilet scheme and try its bit to curb the problem of open defecation. On set snaps: @akshaykumar sir & @psbhumi mam reached on the sets of #TEPK . pic.twitter.com/YhvcyItRRK — Akshay Kumar World (@AkshayKWorld) February 17, 2017 . @akshaykumar sir was shooting for #ToiletEkPremKatha in Hoshangabad, Bhopal today pic.twitter.com/AZ9i8tiSHU — Akshay Kumar World (@AkshayKWorld) February 15, 2017 Video: @akshaykumar sir playing volleyball match on sets of #TEPK in Bhopal today. pic.twitter.com/uIRX8ldQtX — ❤ KHILADI GROUP ❤ (@AkshaySolapurFC) February 16, 2017 Here's @akshaykumar Sir In DESI LOOK for Tepk.... Shoot at NarmdaGath, Hoshangabad #Tepk pic.twitter.com/wsOtaANR1n
